description: Alterations to the front garden involving a redesign of the hard and soft landscaping, including replacement of the non-original concrete block; instatement of a traditional pathway gate opening onto proposed brick paver footpath leading to the front door. Installation of new handrail to right of new front steps;  Replacement of current metal garage door to two wooden doors, installation of small summer house to the rear garden with small patio.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): PP-12428860V1 (LOCATION PLAN); DOCUMENT 1 (EXISTING LAYOUT OF FRONT GARDEN); DOCUMENT 2 (EXISTING LAYOUT OF BACK GARDEN); DOCUMENT 1 (PROPOSED CHANGES TO FRONT GARDEN); DOCUMENT 1A (PROPOSED STEPS); DOCUMENT 1B (PROPOSED HANDRAIL); 1C (PROPOSED GATE); 1D (PROPOSED DRIVE AND PATHWAY); 1E (PROPOSED GARAGE DOORS); DOCUMENT 2 REV 01 (PROPOSED CHANGES TO BACK GARDEN); DOCUMENT 2A (PROPOSED NEW PATIO); DOCUMENT 2B (PROPOSED SUMMERHOUSE); DOCUMENT 2C (PROPOSED SUMMERHOUSE).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those shown in the approved drawings in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), and the Ealing Local Plan 2022 (Reg 18).
